As co-chair of the Congressional Lung Cancer Caucus and a member of the House Appropriations Committee, I am committed to working with my colleagues to fund cancer research and innovative treatment options so that we may one day find a cure to end cancer in its entirety.

On #WorldCancerDay, I remember the words of the legendary Jim Valvano: 

“Cancer can take away all my physical abilities. It cannot touch my mind. It cannot touch my heart. And it cannot touch my soul. And those three things are going to carry on forever."

I look forward to hearing @realDonaldTrump address Congress tonight before a Joint Session. I'm confident that my colleagues and I can continue to work with the president to find solutions to the problems facing everyday Americans. #SOTU2020
